title.narrative: Poverty Shift: Partnerships for Disability-Inclusive Ultra-Poor Graduation, Uganda. Includes Disability-Inclusive Covid-19 Response & Recovery Project in Uganda.

description.narrative: By 2022, our disability-inclusive ultra-poor graduation project will deliver increased socio-economic empowerment and resilience to 1,500 ultra-poor households (70% & 15% of households respectively where the project holder is a woman and/or person with disability) in Western & Northern regions of Uganda. Building evidence & best practice will enable us to reach many more, contributing to sustainable poverty reduction (SDG1) & reducing inequality (SDG 10) for the most marginalised & vulnerable communities in Uganda and globally.

participating-org.narrative: National Union of Women With Disabilities of Uganda
